name: CustomReportTest1
methodology: But I must explain to you how all this mistaken idea of denouncing pleasure and praising pain was born and I will give you a complete account of the system, and expound the actual teachings of the great explorer of the truth, the master-builder of human happiness.
limitations: No one rejects, dislikes, or avoids pleasure itself, because it is pleasure, but because those who do not know how to pursue pleasure rationally encounter consequences that are extremely painful.
references: Nor again is there anyone who loves or pursues or desires to obtain pain of itself, because it is pain, but because occasionally circumstances occur in which toil and pain can procure him some great pleasure.

custom_report_genes.name: BRCA1
custom_report_genes.summary: Heterozygous pathogenic variants in RAD50 gene are associated with autosomal dominant hereditary breast cancer, while biallelic (homozygous or compound heterozygous) pathogenic variants are associated with autosomal recessive Nijmegen breakage syndrome-like disorder.

custom_report_variations.description:
The asparagine residue is weakly conserved and there is a small physicochemical difference between asparagine and serine.
This variant is present in population databases (rs80358759, ExAC 0.01%).

This sequence change replaces asparagine with serine at codon 1793 of the BRCA2 protein (p.Asn1793Ser). The asparagine residue is weakly conserved and there is a small physicochemical difference between asparagine and serine.

custom_report_result.result: One Pathogenic variant identified in RAD50. RAD50 is associated with autosomal dominant hereditary breast cancer and autosomal recessive Nijmegen breakage syndrome-like disorder. Additional Variant(s) of Uncertain Significance identified.

custom_report_interpretation.interpretation: This result is consistent with a predisposition to, or diagnosis of, autosomal dominant RAD50-related conditions.
